Please feel free to use a different markup language if you do not plan to run
<tt>rake doc:app</tt>.

vigenere-crack

Coursework 1 - Frequency analysis

Decipher a text that was given. You know that it was encrypted based on very simple encryption ciphers. You have to submit:

    Your source code.

    A report (IEEE/ACM/Springer format) describing your solution (2-4 pages).

Sample ciphertext for the first coursework:
